system.availability: Hodded Robes holding various meanings often hard to discern even by those of the Dark Angels themselves. Can be a Scholar's Robe (Choose one Scholastic Lore, add +3 to all Tests with it), a Robe of Secrets (Choose one Forbidden Lore, add +3 to all Tests with it), or a Seeker's Robe (+3 to Scrutiny Tests).
system.cost:
Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping.
Chapter: Dark Angels (alternative is a Ceremonial sword in Weapons Section)
